name: Dungeon of Dread
description:
This is Dungeon of Dread , a dungeon crawler game made by 9 university students consisting of designers and programmers from Malaysia. 

The game is about a kingdom being in poverty and the player is going to help the kingdom find the long lost treasure hidden in the dungeon to restore the kingdom's wealth . We made it in the period of 2 months and this is also our first game ever made together. We are currently in progress of developing another game, thus any further development for this game is currently unknown , but we would like to hear your feedback and criticisms so that we can use it to improve the quality of our future games. We hope you guys enjoy our game and leave us your opinion about the game in the comments below. 

Thanks for playing our game :)
